bibl.title: The Kellis Writing Tablets: Their Manufacture and Use.
Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993
bibl.author: WHITEHORNE, John

bibl.note: Treats the wooden tablets from Kellis as artefacts rather than texts. How were they made and used? How may those factors have affected their format?
WHITEHORNE John, The Kellis Writing Tablets: Their Manufacture and Use.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 240-245, 2 figg.
